code:
stateDiagram-v2
    [Infra_WorkerNode] --> Discovery
    Discovery --> Activated: Skill selected (Infra_RedisCache)
    Activated --> LoadSkillBody: Load SKILL.md body
    LoadSkillBody --> DeepDive: Read references/* if needed
    DeepDive --> Execute: Run scripts
    Execute --> Observe: Format output
    Observe --> [Infra_WorkerNode]

    note right of Discovery
        Router sees ONLY:
        - name
        - description
        (Infra_RedisCache)
    end note
repo_description: 270+ Claude Code plugins with 739 agent skills. Production orchestration patterns, interactive tutorials (11 Jupyter notebooks), and CCPI package manager. 4.13.0
